content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to browse the website https://www.reuters.com/ to find an article on the use of Pegasus spyware in Mexico. The website did not provide any information on the topic. You then commanded my computer to perform a Google search for "Pegasus spyware Mexico," and it found multiple articles from Reuters, the New York Times, and the Guardian. You then asked me to browse the Reuters website again to find an article on the topic, but it did not mention anything. In the latest development, you attempted to read a file from the New York Times website, but it returned an error saying that the file was not found. You then commanded me to browse the New York Times website and search for an article on the use of Pegasus spyware in Mexico.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Yes, there is an article on the use of Pegasus spyware in Mexico. The article reports that the country's top human rights official was targeted with the spyware while looking into abuses by the armed forces. \n \n Links: ['Skip to content (https://www.nytimes.com/#site-content)', 'Continue reading the main story (https://www.nytimes.com/#after-dfp-ad-top)', ' (https://www.nytimes.com/)', 'U.S. (https://www.nytimes.com/)', 'International (https://www.nytimes.com/international/?action=click&region=Editions&pgtype=Homepage)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://www.nytimes.com/2023/04/18/world/americas/pegasus-spyware-mexico.html", "question": "Can you provide a summary of the article on the use of Pegasus spyware in Mexico?"}}}'}]
"""
